SEARCH
Package userInterface

Class LeaveUI

java.lang.Object
userInterface.LeaveUI
All Implemented Interfaces:
LeaveInterface
public class LeaveUI extends Object implements LeaveInterface
Handles the user interface for leave management.

This class implements LeaveInterface and provides functionality for doctors to apply for leave, view leave requests, and manage leave-related operations such as approving, rejecting, updating, and removing leave requests.

  • Method Details

    • applyLeave

      public void applyLeave(Scanner sc, Doctor doctor)
      Allows a doctor to apply for leave.

      The method prompts the doctor to enter a future date and a reason for the leave. The leave request is then submitted to the LeaveManager.

      Specified by:
      applyLeave in interface LeaveInterface
      Parameters:
      sc - A Scanner object for user input.
      doctor - The Doctor applying for the leave.

    • displayAllLeaveRequests

      public void displayAllLeaveRequests()
      Displays all leave requests in the system.

      This method delegates the operation to the LeaveManager.

      Specified by:
      displayAllLeaveRequests in interface LeaveInterface

    • displayPendingLeave

      public void displayPendingLeave(Scanner sc, Doctor doctor)
      Displays all pending leave requests for a specific doctor.
      Specified by:
      displayPendingLeave in interface LeaveInterface
      Parameters:
      sc - A Scanner object for user input.
      doctor - The Doctor whose pending leave requests are displayed.

    • displayLeaveOutcome

      public void displayLeaveOutcome(Scanner sc, Doctor doctor)
      Displays the outcome of leave requests (approved or rejected) for a specific doctor.
      Specified by:
      displayLeaveOutcome in interface LeaveInterface
      Parameters:
      sc - A Scanner object for user input.
      doctor - The Doctor whose leave outcomes are displayed.

    • manageLeaveRequests

      public void manageLeaveRequests(Scanner sc)
      Manages leave requests by allowing approval or rejection.

      This method displays all leave requests, prompts the user to select a specific request by ID, and provides options to approve or reject the request.

      Specified by:
      manageLeaveRequests in interface LeaveInterface
      Parameters:
      sc - A Scanner object for user input.

    • approveLeaveRequests

      public void approveLeaveRequests(String leaveID)
      Approves a specific leave request.
      Parameters:
      leaveID - The ID of the leave request to approve.

    • rejectLeaveRequests

      public void rejectLeaveRequests(String leaveID)
      Rejects a specific leave request.
      Parameters:
      leaveID - The ID of the leave request to reject.

    • updateLeave

      public void updateLeave(Scanner sc, Doctor doctor)
      Updates a pending leave request for a doctor.

      The method allows the doctor to select a leave request and update its date and reason.

      Specified by:
      updateLeave in interface LeaveInterface
      Parameters:
      sc - A Scanner object for user input.
      doctor - The Doctor updating the leave request.

    • removeLeave

      public void removeLeave(Scanner sc, Doctor doctor)
      Removes a pending leave request for a doctor.
      Specified by:
      removeLeave in interface LeaveInterface
      Parameters:

      doctor - The Doctor removing the leave request.
